attributes.action: Give the same benefits for Winter Fuel Payment to the Disabled as well as over 60,s!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It seems ludicrous that always the Prime Minister and others organise these extra supplements for over 60,s and no mention is made of the Disabled who are on High Mobility and High Care! As one of these type of people I need hot water and heat all the time for my medical condition! My heating and hot water are supplied by a combi boiler which is oil fired and fitted to give me more control over the heat in my house not realising that the cost of oil would go through the roof!

Please help your Disabled members of the population!!!
